bibl.title: A New Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: The Hypothesis of Euripides' Alexandros.

series.title: University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No.

bibl.note: Cf. Idem, P. Oxy. ined.: The Hypothesis of Euripides, Alexandros, Akten des XIII. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses Marburg/Lahn 1971 (München, 1974) p. 89 [= P. Oxy. LII, 3650].
bibl.seg: Coles Revel A., A New Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: The Hypothesis of Euripides' Alexandros. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 32.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1974, 4°, vii-70 pp. et VI pll.
Cf. Idem, P. Oxy. ined.: The Hypothesis of Euripides, Alexandros, Akten des XIII. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses Marburg/Lahn 1971 (München, 1974) p. 89 [= P. Oxy. LII, 3650].

C.R. par J. M. Bremer, Mnemosyne 4e s., 28 (1975) pp. 308-312. - Hélène Cadell, RPhil 3e s., 50 (1976) pp. 123-124. - M. J. Costelloe, StPap 14 (1975) pp. 150-151. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 307-308. - H. G. Edinger, BASP 13 (1976) pp. 133-135. - Richard Hamilton, AJP 97 (1976) pp. 65-70. - Jean Irigoin, REG 90 (1977) pp. 154-155. - François Jouan, Gnomon 48 (1976) pp. 808-810. - Wolfgang Luppe, DLZ 97 (1976) coll. 26-28. - Olimpio Musso, Prometheus 2 (1976) p. 288. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 44 (1975) pp. 707-708. - N. G. Wilson, CR N.S., 27 (1977) p. 105.
